snippet: A jury in St. Louis decided that the company did not discriminate against a former executive by paying her less than a male predecessor.
abstract: St Louis jury decides that Anheuser-Busch did not discriminate against former executive Francine Katz by paying her less than male predecessor, John Jacob.
lead_paragraph: A jury in St. Louis decided that the company did not discriminate against a former executive by paying her less than a male predecessor.

headline.main: Anheuser-Busch Is Found Not Guilty of Bias
headline.print_headline: Anheuser-Busch Is Found Not Guilty of Bias
